ModMetaData.name: Wildlife Tab
ModMetaData.author: lincore
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a new tab that conveniently lists all wild animals. Animals belonging to a faction are excluded from this list (with the exception of the insectoid faction).
Non-steam and previous releases as well as the source code for my mods can be found on github: https://github.com/lincore81/RimworldMods/
Thank you ShawnBuckley for providing the update to Alpha 16. Appreciate it!
Changes: 2016/21/12: - Update to A16. 2016/10/16: - The window should now always have the correct height. 2016/09/09: - Trying to hunt/tame animals that are likely to retaliate (>= 20%/2% respectively) will now produce a visable and audible warning. - Added an info button to easily look up an animal's stats. 2016/09/07: - The manhunter-column has been generalized into a warning column. - Members of the insectoid faction (= infestation) are now included in the list. - Members of this faction are indicated by a special warning icon - Made sure hidden creatures will never be listed.
